title: Ticket #4592: Blahp lsf_status bug fixes
description:
OSG has a couple fixes for the lsf_status.sh script in the blahp. We're including them in our build of the blahp.

  • Create a temporary file in /tmp instead of the current working directory
  • Fix a badly formatted error message that causes the blahp daemon to choke. (SOFTWARE-1589)
